trends: There have been no other sightings in Rockwell
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: On the 28th of February,2004,it had snowed and we had gotten clost to a foot of snow.The sky had just cleared,and it was evening as the sun sets about 6:00 pm.On the western horizon,I saw a star-like light,very bright,manuevering around a wispy cloud,very fast.I was stunned at how it moved.My wife and daughter also saw it,and my daughter and I also saw two black discs on the horizon,they were flat on the bottom,so they werent perfectly round.My daughter saw them first,and I only caught a glimpse of it.I was in the Navy,Im a skeptical guy....but what MOVES like what I saw around that cloud???What are the black discs???Some years before I also saw a disc in the evening sky that was a funny mushroom color.I was working at Rent-a- Center and I stopped the truck and got out to look at it it.Other drivers did too,we were on a country road near Concord NC...our comments were that it has to be a balloon,but it was bigger than the moon and quite a distance away,it was disc shaped,but was flat at the bottom,like the black discs,last February.I also saw one night when I was doing a security job at a cell tower whose strobe light kept malfunctioning,a funny light that took off on the horizon----it was 2 flashing GOLD lights,not yellow or amber---these lights were GOLD---and they fused into one red light and accelerated into the sky at an anlge faster than I ever thought possible.....Im not going to say it was extraterrestrial...all Im reporting is what I saw...there are other incidents in my life,but these are the most recent as well as the ones best etched in my mind.....I hope that we have craft that move like this,but then I hope we dont......all I know is that I simply HATE SEEING THINGS THAT I CANT EXPLAIN!!!
